samples.name: Default Functionalities
samples.description: ImageEditor component provides built-in support to edit the image like crop, rotate, flip, insert the shapes and text into the image.

samples.name: Profile Picture
samples.description: ImageEditor component provides built in support to rotate the image using rotate method and crop the image using the select and crop method.

samples.name: Custom Toolbar
samples.description: ImageEditor component provides built in support to edit the images with custom toolbar.

samples.name: File Restriction
samples.description: The Image Editor component provides built-in support to restrict uploaded files based on file size and extensions. Users can dynamically customize the restrictions using numeric inputs and a multi-select dropdown.
